review: This product would work great if for not the constant wifi disconnecting. Two different AC routers and constant disconnecting (Linksys AC 1900 and Netgear NightHawk X6). All my other wifi devices do not experience the problems that the Firestick has with Wifi stability.When it works and stays connected, it is a nice device with Sling, Netflix, HBO etc.
